{{ardayearheader|3017|3018|3019|3020|3021|Fourth Age 1|Fourth Age 2}}
==March==
* '''13''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] is taken ill (on the anniversary of his poisoning by [[Shelob]]).<ref name="AppB4">{{App|B4}}</ref>

==April==
* '''6''' - The [[mallorn]] flowers in the [[Party Field]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==In Spring==
* Death of [[Lobelia Bracegirdle]] (Sackville-Baggins).<ref name=havens>{{RK|VI9}}</ref>

==May==
* '''1''' - [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] marries [[Rose Cotton|Rose]].<ref name="AppB4" />

==[[Midyear's Day]]==
* [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] resigns office of mayor, and [[Will Whitfoot]] is restored.<ref name="AppB4" />

==[[Overlithe]]==
* This was a leap year in [[Shire-reckoning]]. The merrymaking in that year is said to have been the greatest in memory or record, owing to the wonderful summer of that year.<ref>{{App|Shire}}</ref>
==September==
* '''22''' - [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]]'s hundred and thirtieth birthday.<ref name="AppB4" />

==October==
* '''6''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] is again ill.<ref name="AppB4" />

==During the Year==
*This year was remembered as "The Great Year of Plenty" in [[the Shire]].<ref name="AppB4" />
* [[Faramir]] weds [[Éowyn]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 207</ref>
* Frodo begins writing ''The Downfall of the Lord of the Rings and the Return of the King'', his account of the [[War of the Ring]], in the [[Red Book]].<ref name=havens/>

{{references}}
